155.text: Drawing is a form of meditation for me.

162.text: I don't perceive what I'm drawing

In August of 2012,

230.text:

236.text:
My mother was originally

239.text:
She and I were in the early

241.text: as we had intended to go together,

247.text:
The cancer quickly took over

255.text: During the months of her illness, though,

257.text:

262.text: to carry out her final journey.

My drawings celebrate the beauty
